title: Haunted True Crime Teaser - The Black Dahlia
description:
The History Goes Bump Podcast offers an exclusive podcast named Haunted True Crime. Our most recent episode features the case of the Black Dahlia and the hauntings associated with that murder. This is a teaser to give listeners a taste of the content we share with supporters of our show at the $5 or above level each month. For the price of a fancy cup of coffee, you can get several BonusCasts each month in addition to the roughly two a week regular episodes we pump out. We do all this because we love our listeners and you have asked for more. We just need a little help on the financial end of things since we aren't corporate or affiliate or any other kinda sponsored, except for listener sponsored. Become an Executive Producer today!

http://patreon.com/historygoesbump
